name: Melodious Slippers
rules: At the end of each turn, if you played two or more abilities this turn, draw a card.

name: Moccasins of Verdurous Glooms
rules: When an ally you control exhausts, you may pay 1. If you do, your hero has Assault 1 this turn. (It has +1 ATK on your turn.)

name: Rock Furrow Boots
rules: When an armor you control prevents damage, you may add a +1 ATK counter to target weapon.

name: Treads of Fleeting Joy
rules: If your hero would deal 5 or more combat damage while attacking, it deals that much +5 instead.

name: Floating Web
rules: When this armor enter play, add a +1 [Defense] counter to this and each other armor you control.
flavour: The spider will always catch the fly. - Gunra

name: Haunt of Flies
rules: When this armor prevents damage on an opponent's turn, add a fly counter to it.;Remove three fly counters from this armor -> Put a 2 [Nature] / 1 [Health] Swarm ally token into play with Ferocity and Stealth.
flavour: Be like a fly on the wall, and then strike when they least expect it - Magatha Silverton

name: Heavenly Breeze
rules: At the start of your turn, add a breeze counter to this armor.;2, [Exhaust], Remove any number of breeze counters from this armor -> Your hero heals 1 damage from itself for each counter removed this way.

name: Viewless Wings
rules: Allies you control have Assault 1 for each ally you control.
